GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of article with corresponding article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of comments from article with corresponding article id

comment.article_title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns a comment posted to an article with corresponding article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns article with updated vote count with corresponding article id

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: deletes comment with corresponding comment id, returns status 204 with no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
